thread.title: Scottish publisher trolls Milo Yiannopoulos in the most epic way
thread.title_full: Scottish publisher trolls Milo Yiannopoulos in the most epic way

author: Gianluca Mezzofiore
title: Scottish publisher trolls Milo Yiannopoulos in the most epic way
text:
Simon & Schuster has finally pulled Milo Yiannopoulos' book deal after a video emerged showing the alt-right troll and Breitbart editor defending and advocating for sexual relationships between 13-year-olds and adults.
SEE ALSO: Milo Yiannopoulos had a pretty rough Presidents Day
"They canceled my book," Yiannopoulos wrote on Facebook:
But an independent Scottish publisher, Canongate, was over the moon about the news:
Very happy (delighted really) to announce that we’re also not publishing Milo.
— Canongate (@canongatebooks) February 21, 2017
Milo joins such luminaries as two clowns in a bar fight, a piss-covered wolf gnawing its own leg & Piers Morgan on our exciting non-list.
— Canongate (@canongatebooks) February 21, 2017
@mcelhearn @matthaig1 Number 2.
— Canongate (@canongatebooks) February 21, 2017
Even children's book publishers joined the conversation:
@canongatebooks we also previously had discussions with piss-covered wolf about a kids toilet training book but decided not to pursue
— Hachette Children's (@HachetteKids) February 21, 2017
BONUS: Behold, the Trump mask.
